meanings.definition: A synthetic nucleoside analog used to treat hepatitis C.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed ribavirins to help treat my hepatitis C.
meanings.sent2: Many patients with hepatitis C benefit from taking ribavirins.
meanings.sent3: I accidentally spilled ribavirins all over the lab, creating a colorful mess.
meanings.sent4: Her recovery was like a puzzle, with ribavirins being the missing piece that finally fit.
meanings.sent5: The tiny ribavirins worked like little soldiers attacking the virus in her body.
